#summary Changing the content of the settings tab on load
= Introduction =

*Deprecated, only for versions before 0.6.6, see user manual*

The default settings of giTorrent can be adjusted, so that on load your server settings are already filled in. The file "gihome/JSXAPPS/giTorrent/components/appCanvas.xml" contains the values at startup. You can edit it with a normal text editor (like notepad) to change the values for your installation.

= Details =
To change the server address (URI) :
{{{
<object type="jsx3.gui.TextBox">
 <variants jsxheight="18" jsxrelativeposition="0" jsxleft="20" jsxtop="30" jsxwidth="170"/>
 <strings jsxname="URI" jsxmargin="0 4 0 0" jsxdisplay="" jsxvalue="http://my.torrent.server"/>
</object>
}}}
Change the jsxvalue="http://my.torrent.server" to the URI of your web server

To change the port :
{{{
<object type="jsx3.gui.TextBox">
 <variants jsxheight="18" jsxrelativeposition="0" jsxleft="200" jsxtop="30" jsxwidth="50"/>
 <strings jsxname="Port" jsxmargin="0 4 0 0" jsxdisplay="" jsxvalue="80"/>
</object>
}}}
Change the jsxvalue="80" to the port of your web server

To change the userid :
{{{
<object type="jsx3.gui.TextBox">
 <variants jsxheight="18" jsxrelativeposition="0" jsxleft="100" jsxtop="70"/>
 <strings jsxname="UserId" jsxmargin="0 4 0 0" jsxdisplay="" jsxvalue=""/>
</object>
}}}
Change the jsxvalue="" to the user id.

{{{
<object type="jsx3.gui.TextBox">
 <variants jsxtype="2" jsxheight="18" jsxrelativeposition="0" jsxleft="100" jsxtop="100"/>
 <strings jsxname="Password" jsxmargin="0 4 0 0" jsxdisplay="" jsxvalue=""/>
</object>
}}}
Change the jsxvalue="" to the password.
